description:
Jasper is a 21 year old senior in college majoring in mechanical engineering.
When we met with him, he told us about his favorite sexual experience. It involved 2 girls and one of his closest guy friends on a beach late at night.
They were drinking beers celebrating the finishing of final exams. Sure enough, one thing led to another and he started hooking up with one of the girls, and the two others starting hooking up with each other, and before he knew it, everyone was naked, swapping partners. The story got us worked up thinking about it, and I think reliving it again got him pretty worked up too... Check him out as he shows us what he does when he's at home alone.
title: Jasper
